nodes.text: Gann Sakoal was a Human male who served as the senior science officer at the Troida Military Workshop during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Gann suspected that his wife Kelara was in league with Harez Bant. He believed they had stolen the plans to an experimental blaster he was developing for the Empire. To avoid suspicion, he tasked an Imperial spacer to kill his wife for betraying him and arranged the spacer to escort her to the Lower Markaran Outpost where she would soon be executed.
